About Gokarna Water Adventures

Welcome to Gokarna Water Adventures, your trusted partner for exploring the stunning Karwar coastline. We specialize in providing safe, family-friendly, and exhilarating boat trips that cater to all ages. Our fleet of clean, well-maintained boats and our team of experienced, certified local crew members ensure a seamless and memorable experience on the water. Whether you're chasing dolphins at sunrise, discovering hidden beaches unreachable by road, or experiencing the thrill of water sports, we prioritize your safety and enjoyment above all else. Join us to create unforgettable memories on the Arabian Sea!

Choose Your Adventure

Select the perfect package for your friends and family.

3-Hour Premium Adventure Package

Experience the best of Gokarnaâ€™s coastline with our safe, family-friendly and adventure-packed 3-hour boat trip. This premium package covers Tadri Harbour, Aghanashini Backwaters, Heaven Beach, Paradise Beach, Tadri Lighthouse, Half Moon Beach, Mystery Cave and Om Beach.

Activities & Inclusions:

  • Dolphin Watching Spot playful dolphins jumping in the deep blue sea.
  • Kayaking Paddle through the calm and scenic backwaters.
  • Swimming Refresh yourself with a safe dip in the ocean.
  • Boat Riding Enjoy a long, relaxing cruise along the coastline.
  • Snorkeling Explore the vibrant underwater life and corals.
  • Sea Diving Dive deeper to experience the ocean's mystery.
  • Beach Games Play volleyball and frisbee on the sandy shores.
  • Clean boats We sanitize our boats daily for your safety.
  • Life jackets High-quality safety gear provided for everyone.
  • Trained crew Friendly, certified locals to guide your trip.
  • Complimentary snacks Stay energized with free light refreshments.
Call to Book

1-Hour Coastal Sightseeing Package

A quick but beautiful tour of Gokarna's famous spots. Ideal for those short on time but eager to see the highlights.

Locations Covered:

  • Heaven Beach A serene, untouched strip of golden sand, perfect for a peaceful view of the horizon away from the crowds.
  • Paradise Beach Known for its unique rocky terrain and relaxed hippie vibe, this beach is a true slice of tropical paradise.
  • Tadri Lighthouse A historic beacon sitting atop a hill, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the coastline and the vast Arabian Sea.
  • Half Moon Beach A stunning, secluded cove shaped like a half-moon, accessible mainly by boat or a thrilling trek.
  • Mystery Cave An intriguing natural rock formation visible from the boat that adds a touch of mystery and adventure to your trip.
  • Om Beach Gokarna's most famous and spiritual beach, naturally shaped like the auspicious Om symbol.
